Promo1Desc: when you open an account & deposit US$200
Promo2Desc: for every lot you trade, up to 20 lots
Promo4Desc: when you refer a send person
Step1: Create an account with Blackwell Global & log in to the Client Portal.
Step2: Under the ''Promotion'' tab, copy your unique referral link & send it to your referee, or get your referee to scan your unique QR code to create an account with us.
Step3: Monitor your referees in the Referral Activity section to track whether you've fulfilled the requirements for various rewards!
